    • Leader [970pts]

      • Bloodwrack Shrine [190pts]

        Selections: 0. The Circling Flock, 1. Shadow Stone, 4. The Withering, Battle Regiment - 1 Commander, Bloodwrack Spear, Bloodwrack Stare, General, Goadstaves, Tail of Serpents, Whisperclaw, Wounds Suffered

        Artefact: Shadow Stone, Bloodwrack Shrine Wound Track: 00-03, 04-06, 07-10, 11+, Command Trait: The Circling Flock, Magic: Bloodwrack Shrine, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Enfeebling Foe, Mystic Shield, The Withering, Unit: Bloodwrack Shrine, Unit Abilities: Aura of Agony, Bladed Impact, Bloodwrack Stare, Weapon: Bloodwrack Spear, Bloodwrack Stare, Goadstaves, Tail of Serpents, Whisperclaw

        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        The Circling Flock Once per battle, at the end of your movement phase, you can say that this general will summon a flock of Khinerai to the battlefield. If you do so, you can add 1 KHINERAI HARPIES unit of 5 models to your army. Set up that unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Bloodwrack Shrine 1/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Enfeebling Foe
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Enfeebling Foe 518"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        The Withering 718"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks that target that unit unit until your next hero phase. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine (2018) p54
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Bloodwrack Shrine *1385+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aura of Agony At the start of your hero phase, you can roll 1 dice for each enemy unit within 7" of this model. If the roll is equal to or greater than the Aura of Agony value shown on this model’s damage table, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. The same unit cannot be affected by this ability more than once per turn.
        Bladed Impact After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a dice. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Bloodwrack Stare Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with this model’s Bloodwrack Stare. Instead, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models from the target unit that are in range of the attack. For each 5+, the target unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

      • Morathi-Khaine [240pts]

        Selections: 5. Mindrazor, Bladed Wings, Command Entourage - 2-3 Sub-Commanders, Heartrender (Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine)

        Categories: AELF, HERO, WIZARD, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, MORATHI-KHAINE, Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader

        Command Abilities: Worship Through Bloodshed, Magic: Magic, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Black Horror of Ulgu, Mindrazor, Mystic Shield, Unit: Morathi-Khaine, Unit Abilities: Commanding Presence, One Soul, Two Bodies, Weapon: Bladed Wings, Heartrender (Morathi-Khaine)


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Worship Through Bloodshed If this model is on the battlefield, you can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do, pick 1 other friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit wholly within 24" of this model. That unit can shoot or, if it is within 3" of any enemy units, it can fight. You cannot use this command ability more than once in the same phase. Broken Realms: Morathi
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Magic 3/2. Add 1 to casting, dispelling and unbinding rolls for this model.Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Black Horror of Ulgu
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Black Horror of Ulgu 736"Pick 1 enemy unit within range of the caster that is visible to them and roll a dice. On a 1, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 2-3, it suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 4+, it suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Mindrazor 818"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit wholly within 18" of the caster. Improve the Rend characteristic of that unit's melee weapons by 1 until your next hero phase. In addition, until your next hero phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that unit's melee weapons if it made a charge move in the same turn. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine (2018) p54
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Morathi-Khaine 6"684+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Commanding Presence Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this model.
        One Soul, Two Bodies If the Shadow Queen is on the battlefield, wounds and mortal wounds that would be allocated to this model are instead allocated to the Shadow Queen and have no effect on this model. Wounds and mortal wounds allocated to the Shadow Queen in this way cannot be negated.

        In addition, if the Shadow Queen is on the battlefield and an ability or spell would cause this model to be slain without any wounds being allocated, then this model is not slain and 3 wounds are allocated to the Shadow Queen.

        If the Shadow Queen is slain, after her model is removed from play, this model is also slain.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Bladed Wings Melee2"63+3+-11
        Heartrender (Morathi-Khaine) Melee2"33+3+-1D3

      • Slaughter Queen [120pts]

        Selections: 0. Gaisa's Falx, Blade of Khaine, Command Entourage - 2-3 Sub-Commanders, Deathsword

        Categories: AELF, HERO, PRIEST, SLAUGHTER QUEEN, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader

        Artefact: Gaisa's Falx, Command Trait: Orgy of Slaughter, Prayer: Dance of Doom, Rune of Khaine, Touch of Death, Unit: Slaughter Queen, Unit Abilities: Priestess of Khaine, Weapon: Blade of Khaine, Deathsword


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Gaisa's Falx Pick 1 of the bearer's melee weapons. If the unmodifed hit roll for an attack made with that weapon is 6, the attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Orgy of Slaughter You can use this command ability once per turn in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit that has not fought in that phase and is wholly within 12" of this model and within 3" of any enemy units. That unit can fight. Battletome: DoK Errata, June 2018
        Prayer DescriptionAnswer ValueRange Ref
        Dance of Doom If answered, in the combat phase, after the chanter has fought in that phase for the first time, when it is your turn to pick a unit to fight, the chanter can be picked to fight for a second time if it is within 3" of any enemy units.3- Battletome: Daughters of Khaine Errata, July 2021 p2
        Rune of Khaine If answered, pick 1 of the chanter’s melee weapons (it cannot be a weapon used by a mount). Until your next hero phase, that melee weapon has a Damage characteristic of D3 instead of the value shown in its profile.3- Battletome: Daughters of Khaine Errata, July 2021 p1
        Touch of Death If answered, pick 1 enemy unit within range 1 and visible to the chanter. Then, take a dice and hide it in one of your hands. Your opponent must pick one of your hands. If they pick the one holding the dice, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.33" Battletome: Daughters of Khaine Errata, July 2021 p2
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Slaughter Queen 6"585+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Priestess of Khaine In your hero phase, this model can chant 1 prayer. If it does so, pick 1 of the prayers and make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, this model suffers 1 mortal wound and the prayer is not answered. On a 2, the prayer is not answered. On a 3+, the prayer is answered.

      • The Shadow Queen [420pts]

        Selections: Command Entourage - 1 Commander, Crown of Serpents, Envenomed Tail, Gaze of Morathi, Heartrender (The Shadow Queen), Wounds Suffered

        Categories: AELF, HERO, THE SHADOW QUEEN, MONSTER, WIZARD, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, Leader, Behemoth

        Battalion Abilities: Two Bodies, One Soul, Morathi Wound Track: 00-03, 04-06, 07-08, 09-10, 11+, Unit: The Shadow Queen, Unit Abilities: Fly, Fury of the Shadow Queen, Iron Heart of Khaine, Weapon: Crown of Serpents, Envenomed Tail, Gaze of Morathi, Heartrender (The Shadow Queen)


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Two Bodies, One Soul If this model is on the battlefield, wounds and mortal wounds that would be allocated to Morathi-Khaine are instead allocated to this model and have no effect on Morathi-Khaine. Wounds and mortal wounds allocated to this model in this way cannot be negated.

        In addition, if this model is on the battlefield and an ability or spell would cause Morathi-Khaine to be slain without any wounds being allocated, then Morathi-Khaine is not slain and 3 wounds are allocated to this model.

        If this model is slain, after this model is removed from play, Morathi-Khaine is also slain.
        Morathi Wound Track MoveHeartrenderEnvenomed Tail Ref
        00-03 14"86
        04-06 12"75
        07-08 10"64
        09-10 8"53
        11+ 6"42
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        The Shadow Queen *12104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Fury of the Shadow Queen While this model is within 3" of any enemy models, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly KHINERAI HARPIES and MELUSAI units wholly within 18" of this model.
        Iron Heart of Khaine No more than 3 wounds and/or mortal wounds can be suffered by this model in the same turn. Once 3 wounds and/or mortal wounds have been allocated to this model in the same turn, not counting any wounds that were negated, any further wounds and mortal wounds that would be allocated to this model are ignored and have no effect.

        Wounds and mortal wounds allocated to this model at the start of the battle round count towards the number of wounds allocated to this model in the first turn of that battle round. Wounds and mortal wounds allocated to this model at the end of the battle round count towards the number of wounds allocated to this model in the second turn of that battle round.

        If the rule for an ability or spell would cause this model to be slain without any wounds being allocated, 3 wounds are allocated to this model instead. These wounds cannot be negated but will still be ignored once 3 wounds and/or mortal wounds have been allocated to this model.

        Wounds allocated to this model cannot be healed
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Crown of Serpents Melee1"2D6 3+3+-1
        Envenomed Tail Melee3"13+3+-2*
        Gaze of Morathi Missile18"12+2+-3D6
        Heartrender (The Shadow Queen) Melee2"*3+3+-23

      • Witch Aelves [120pts]

        Selections: 10 Witch Aelves [120pts], Battle Regiment - 2-5 Troops, Bladed Bucklers, Hornblower, Standard Bearer

        Categories: AELF, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, WITCH AELVES, Battleline

        Unit: Witch Aelves, Unit Abilities: Bladed Bucklers, Frenzied Fervour, Hag, Horn Blower, Standard Bearer, Weapon: Sacrificial Knife


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Witch Aelves 6"176+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bladed Bucklers Add 1 to save rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target a unit armed with Bladed Bucklers. In addition, if the unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets a unit armed with Bladed Bucklers is 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Frenzied Fervour Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by this unit while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE HEROES.
        Hag 1 model in this unit can be a Hag. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Horn Blower 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Units that include any Hornblowers can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        Standard Bearer 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. You can re-roll failed battleshock tests for units that include any Standard Bearers.

      • Khainite Shadowstalkers [120pts]

        Selections: 9 Khainite Shadowstalkers [120pts], Assassin's Blades, Battle Regiment - 2-5 Troops, Cursed Missiles, Umbral Blades

        Categories: AELF, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, KHAINITE SHADOWSTALKERS, ORDER, Other

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Khainite Shadowstalkers 6"175+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Cursed Missiles If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with Cursed Missiles is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Harness Shadows Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit.
        Shadow Leap In your movement phase, instead of making a normal move with this unit, you can say that it will shadow leap. If you do so, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Shroud Queen 1 model in this unit can be a Shroud Queen. A Shroud Queen is armed with Umbral Blades and Cursed Missiles. In addition, a Shroud Queen has a Wounds characteristic of 3.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Daughters of Khaine

          Selections: Khelt Nar

          Battle Trait: Blood Rites, Fanatical Faith, Strike and Fade, Command Abilities: Bleed the Mind


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Blood Rites Friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units gain an ability each battle round, as shown on the following list. Note that all abilities are cumulative. For example, in the second battle round, re-roll rolls of 1 when a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit runs and also when it charges.

        1. Quickening Bloodlust: You can re-roll run rolls of 1 for this unit.

        2. Headlong Fury: You can re-roll dice rolls of 1 when making charge rolls for this unit.

        3. Zealot's Rage: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, friendly AVATARS OF KHAINE are automatically Animated (see the model’s warscroll).

        4. Slaughterer's Strength: You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this unit.

        5. Unquenchable Fervour: Worsen the Rend characteristic of weapons that target this unit by 1, to a minimum of ‘-’. In addition, do not take battleshock tests for this unit.
        		 Battletome: Daughters of Khaine Errata, July 2021 p1
        Fanatical Faith Roll a dice each time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE model. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine (2021) p61
        Strike and Fade Friendly KHELT NAR units can retreat and still charge later in the same turn. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine (2021) p72
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Bleed the Mind You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly KHELT NAR unit wholly within 12" of a friendly KHELT NAR HERO. Until your next hero phase, if the unmodifed hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets that KHELT NAR unit is 1, that attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attack have been resolved. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine (2021) p72

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Prized Sorcery

        Categories: Game Options

        Grand Strategy: Prized Sorcery


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Prized Sorcery When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any WIZARDS from your starting army on the battlefield.
